mapper.insert: insert into sf_order_pic( b2b_order_id, waybill_no, task_code, picture, process_flag, process_time, process_comment, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, quarter )values ( #{b2bOrderId}, #{waybillNo}, #{taskCode}, #{picture}, #{processFlag}, #{processTime}, #{processComment}, #{createById}, #{createDt}, #{updateById}, #{updateDt}, #{quarter} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sf_order_pic SET process_flag = #{processFlag}, process_time = process_time+1, process_comment = #{processComment}, update_date = #{updateDt} WHERE id = #{id}
